Claim: "A woman and two children walk along stones to cross a river while a dog swims."
Referring expressions: Woman, children, dog, river stones  A dog
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists d (exists b ((IsWalkingAlong(a,b) and IsInRiverStones(d)) and HasDog(c))))) & (forall f (forall g (  HasDog(f) ->  IsSleeping(g)))) & (forall i (forall h ( IsSleeping(h) ->   HasDog(i))))) -> (exists e (IsSleeping(e)))
